data.persona: I build the King's ships.  I work at the ship yard near the castle.  Most ships I build are for war.
data.description:
You are in the Throne room.
The throne room has a throne all the way in the back of the room in the center. There is a silver carpet that lead up to the throne as you walk into the room. There are pictures of royalty hanging in the room and multiple chandeliers are hanging up. There throne chair in the back of the room with jewelry on it
The sad woman is here.

You are carrying a tool, wearing a second pair of clothing, and wielding a hammer.

data.short_motivation: I want to console the sad woman
data.mid_motivation: I want the sad woman to compose herself before going in to see the king
data.long_motivation: I want the woman to give the king a good impression of our progress to ensure continued funding

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give progress report  to sad woman
